ygData.subject: Group Play
ygData.msgSnippet: Salutations All! I ve been playing some nwn recently with a few friends on Friday evenings and was wondering if there might be some interest in forming an EQ
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations All!

I've been playing some nwn recently with a few friends on Friday
evenings and was wondering if there might be some interest in forming
an EQ group to meet on one evening a week and adventure together for
a while. We could start a set of new characters and bring them up as
a group. I would be willing to meet on whatever server and be
whatever class or race that was needed. We could form a little party
and help each other out. I thought it might be fun. Is there anyone
else who has any intrest in an idea like this.

If so let's discuss the details.

:o)
Brangvyne
